title: Getting your medical history
context: Ask a patient if their family has a history of specific diseases.

content.bestLine: Does your family have a history of any major diseases?

neutral.text: Is there a history of illness in your family?
Do you have any family health issues?
Are there any diseases that run in your family?
Can you tell me about your family's medical history?
Have any of your relatives had serious health problems?
Is there a history of certain conditions in your family?
Do you know of any health issues that are common in your family?

formal.text: Could you inform me about your family's medical background?
I need to know about any hereditary conditions in your family.
Please tell me about your family's health history.
Are there any genetic disorders that I should be aware of?
Can you provide information about your family's illness history?

patterns.template: Does your family have a history of [options]?
Have you had any [options] in your family?
patterns.meaning: ask about the relationship of affected family members

dialogs.description: Doctor asking about family medical history

lines.speaker: Doctor
lines.text: Can you tell me about your family's medical history?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: Yes, my father had heart disease and my mother has diabetes.

lines.speaker: Nurse
lines.text: Do you know of any genetic disorders that run in your family?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: Actually, my sister has a genetic condition, but I'm not sure about the details.
